UppercaseWords(String)

Uppercase words. This program defines a method named UppercaseWords that is equivalent to the ucwords function in scripting languages such as PHP. The UppercaseWords method internally converts the string to a character array buffer. Source : http://www.dotnetperls.com/uppercase-first-letter
